properties.name: longboard.upwork.client.key
properties.description: The client key to be used by when connecting to the UpWork OAuth API.

properties.name: longboard.upwork.client.secret
properties.description: The client secret to be used by when connecting to the UpWork OAuth API.

properties.name: longboard.wave.client.key
properties.description: The client key to be used by when connecting to the Wave GraphQL API.

properties.name: longboard.wave.client.secret
properties.description: The client secret to be used by when connecting to the Wave GraphQL API.

properties.name: longboard.wave.client.debug
properties.description: Enable debug logging for the Wave GraphQL API client.

properties.name: longboard.upwork.client.callback
properties.description: The callback URL to be supplied to the UpWork OAuth API, if any.

properties.name: longboard.cors.order
properties.description: The filter order to be applied to the CorsFilter.

properties.name: longboard.cors.max-age
properties.description: The CORS max-age value to be set.

properties.name: longboard.cors.headers
properties.description: The comma separated list of allowed CORS headers.

properties.name: longboard.cors.origins
properties.description: The comma separated list of allowed CORS origins.

properties.name: longboard.cors.methods
properties.description: The comma separated list of allowed CORS methods methods.

properties.name: longboard.wave.oauth.login
properties.description: The OAuth endpoint to be used when requesting an authorization code from Wave.

properties.name: longboard.wave.oauth.scopes
properties.description: A comma separated list of OAuth scopes to request from Wave.

properties.name: longboard.wave.oauth.callback
properties.description: The OAuth callback to submitted to Wave when requesting authorization.

properties.name: longboard.wave.oauth.token
properties.description: The OAuth endpoint to be used when requesting an access token from Wave.
